item.title: 美联储 12 月减息成疑，美元上涨：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五早盘将攀升，尽管交易员们缩减了对美联储下月降息的预期，这拖累了美国股市，并使美元走强。【原文：Asian equities were set to climb early Friday even as traders scaled back expectations for a Federal Reserve rate cut next month which weighed on US stocks and strengthened the dollar.】

item.title: 富兰克林将整合 Wamco 的部分业务，在资金外流的情况下裁员
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc）将开始接管其 Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Franklin Resources Inc. will start taking over parts of its Western Asset Management Co. unit as the bond house grapples with a Securities and Exchange Commission investigation into its star bond manager, Ken Leech.】

item.title: 穆迪因宪法改革下调墨西哥信用展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将墨西哥的信用前景从稳定下调至负面，称最近的宪法改革有可能损害这个拉丁美洲第二大经济体。【原文：Mexico’s credit outlook was lowered to negative from stable by Moody’s Ratings, which said recent constitutional changes risk hurting Latin America’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 资金洪流 "追逐美国银行业最热门的新业务
item.description:
投资者对 SRT 交易的需求很高— 而资深人士担心这会带来麻烦

。【原文：

Investor demand for SRT deals is high — and veterans worry that may lead to trouble

】

item.title: 中国发动新贸易战的不对称工具蕴含全球风险
item.description: 面对与美国再次发生贸易冲突的前景，中国拥有了新的力量，近年来其报复范围不断扩大，包括能够对全球商业和金融造成严重破坏的工具。【原文：China wields new powers as it confronts the prospect of another trade conflict with the US, expanding its retaliatory reach in recent years to include tools capable of wreaking havoc on global commerce and finance.】

item.title: 迈克尔-伯利增持中国股票，但谨慎规避风险
item.description: 迈克尔-伯利（Michael Burry）是因 2008 年押注美国房地产市场而闻名的对冲基金经理，随着中国政府推出刺激政策，他在第三季度进一步增持了包括阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd. ）在内的中国股票，但同时也增加了新的看跌期权，以提供下行保护。【原文：Michael Burry, the hedge fund manager famous for his 2008 bet against the US housing market, further increased his exposures in China stocks including Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd. in the third quarter as Beijing rolled out a stimulus blitz, but also added new bearish options that would provide downside protection.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司收购多米诺比萨、Pool Corp.
item.description: 由于董事长沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）削减了一些长期持有的投资，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.这两家新公司的股票在纽约尾盘交易中跳涨。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. bought stock in Domino’s Pizza Inc. and Pool Corp. during the third quarter as Chairman Warren Buffett cut back on some long-held investments. Shares of the two new holdings jumped in late New York trading.】

item.title: 计算机语言 Basic 的共同创造者托马斯-库尔茨逝世，享年 96 岁
item.description: 托马斯-库尔茨（Thomas E. Kurtz）逝世，他是达特茅斯学院的教授，在 20 世纪 60 年代与他人共同创建了新手友好型计算机代码 Basic，并在个人计算机兴起期间帮助使其成为程序员的行业标准。享年 96 岁。【原文：Thomas E. Kurtz, a Dartmouth College professor who co-created the novice-friendly computer code known as Basic during the 1960s and helped make it the industry standard for programmers during the rise of personal computing, has died. He was 96.】

item.title: 投资跟不上，加拿大基础设施不断老化
item.description: 随着基础设施投资的放缓，加拿大的高速公路、购物中心、学校和设备正在老化而得不到更换。【原文：Canada’s highways, shopping centers, schools and equipment are aging without being replaced as investment in infrastructure slows.】

item.title: 应用材料公司预测引发芯片支出担忧
item.description: 美国最大的芯片制造设备制造商应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc., the largest US maker of chip-manufacturing equipment, gave a disappointing revenue forecast, signaling that some semiconductor customers may be holding off on orders.】

item.title: 美国将韩国列入外汇监控观察名单
item.description: 美国财政部将韩国列入外汇行为 "监控名单"，该名单继续包括日本和德国，并再次批评中国在货币管理方面缺乏透明度。【原文：The US Treasury added South Korea to a “monitoring list” for foreign-exchange practices that continues to include Japan and Germany, and reiterated its criticism of China’s lack of transparency with regard to managing its currency.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将关键利率维持在 8.5%，以巩固通胀放缓态势
item.description: 乌拉圭周四将关键利率稳定在 8.5%，以确保通胀和通胀预期继续向目标区间的中点放缓。【原文：Uruguay held its key interest rate steady at 8.5% on Thursday to ensure that inflation and inflation expectations continue to slow toward the midpoint of the target range.】

item.title: 马龙呼吁与 Charter 进行更多有线电视整合
item.description: 自由媒体（Liberty Media）董事长约翰-马龙（John Malone）周四在投资者日上表示，应该允许 Charter Communications Inc.【原文：Charter Communications Inc. should be allowed to merge with a larger media or telecom rival to stay competitive against technology companies that are unregulated and also vie for internet audiences, Liberty Media Chairman John Malone said at an investor day Thursday.】

item.title: 交易员因鲍威尔的谨慎而削减对美联储 12 月降息的押注
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示经济韧性为官员们更谨慎地放宽政策提供了空间后，交易员们降低了对12月降息的预期，对政策敏感的美国收益率跳涨。【原文：Traders pared back their expectations for an interest-rate cut in December and policy-sensitive US yields jumped after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said economic resilience gives officials room to ease more carefully.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）放弃德克萨斯州土地置换星舰火箭中心的交易
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份公司备忘录，SpaceX 公司已经放弃了与德克萨斯州达成的长期土地协议，该协议将用于扩大该公司的星际飞船火箭业务。【原文：SpaceX has walked out on its long-coveted land deal with Texas that would have been used to expand the company’s Starship rocket operations, according to a company memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Tether 开始将股票和债券代币化
item.description: 全球最大的数字资产公司 Tether Holdings Ltd. 正在涉足股票、债券、基金和商品的代币化。【原文：Tether Holdings Ltd., the world’s largest digital asset company, is getting into the tokenization of stocks, bonds, funds and commodities.】

item.title: Spotify 力推更多视频播客，让电视网防不胜防
item.description:
联席总裁古斯塔夫-索德斯特伦（Gustav Söderström）解释了瑞典流媒体服务为何在推出无广告视频产品的同时向优酷用户示好

。【原文：

Co-President Gustav Söderström explains why the Swedish streaming service is wooing YouTubers while rolling out an ad-free video product

】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称经济强劲无需急于降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，美国经济近期的表现 "非常好"，这为央行官员以谨慎的步伐降低利率提供了空间。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the recent performance of the US economy has been “remarkably good,” giving central bankers room to lower interest rates at a careful pace.】

item.title: 纽约州为未经证实的家庭医疗服务支付了 145 亿美元
item.description: 纽约州主计长托马斯-迪纳波利（Thomas DiNapoli）的审计发现，纽约州花费了 145 亿美元用于为低收入居民提供家庭医疗服务，但却没有提供所需的证明。【原文：New York state spent $14.5 billion on home health care services for low-income residents without required proof they took place, an audit by state Comptroller Thomas DiNapoli found.】

item.title: 亚马逊因与 TikTok 关系日益密切遭国会质询
item.description:
零售业巨头 9 月被召至华盛顿，向众议院中国问题委员会发表演讲

。【原文：

Retail giant was summoned to Washington in September to speak to House Committee on China

】

item.title: 美国贸易部长称需要有针对性的关税以避免对华冲击
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的贸易谈判代表说，为了防止中国大量进口汽车、清洁能源和半导体等产品，有必要使用有针对性的关税。【原文：President Joe Biden’s trade negotiator said the use of targeted tariffs is necessary to guard against China deluging the US with imports such as cars, clean energy and semiconductors.】

item.title: 贝莱德曾一度对小额债券持谨慎态度，如今却表示是时候再次买入了
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的策略师们三个月前建议投资者从市政债券中撤出，现在他们说是时候转回了。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s strategists, who three months ago advised investors to pull back from municipal bonds, now say it’s time to shift back in.】

item.title: UFC 首席执行官怀特预计明年将签订 10 年媒体版权协议
item.description: 终极格斗冠军赛首席执行官达纳-怀特（Dana White）表示，明年终极格斗冠军赛将出售媒体版权，这家综合格斗公司将寻求长达十年的合作伙伴关系。【原文：When the Ultimate Fighting Championship shops around its media rights next year, the mixed-martial-arts company will be looking for a decade-long partnership, Chief Executive Officer Dana White said.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易 "仍在推动市场，但它能持续多久？
item.description: 共和党人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在大选中获胜，迅速推高了美国股市、美元和比特币；在他准备于 1 月份重返总统宝座之际，重塑了投资前景。特朗普贸易 "将笼罩市场，他的关税、减税和放松管制等破坏性政策议程将推动全球投资格局发生重大变化。随着特朗普希望打破从自由贸易到美联储独立等一切方面的规范，这个时代可能会变得更加动荡不安。【原文：Republican Donald Trump’s election win quickly pushed up US stocks, the dollar and Bitcoin — reshaping the outlook for investments as he prepares to return to the presidency in January. The “Trump trade” is set to hang over markets, with his disruptive policy agenda of tariffs, tax cuts and deregulation driving big moves across the global investment landscape. The era could get even more volatile with Trump looking to break norms on everything from free trade to Federal Reserve independence.】

item.title: 德国 Evotec 公司获得 Halozyme 公司的收购意向
item.description: 知情人士透露，德国 Evotec SE 公司正吸引纳斯达克上市生物技术公司 Halozyme Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Germany’s Evotec SE is attracting potential takeover interest from Nasdaq-listed biotech firm Halozyme Therapeutics Inc., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 博利登即将完成收购伦丁欧洲矿山的交易
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，瑞典 Boliden AB 公司正在接近达成收购伦丁矿业公司在欧洲的两个矿山的交易。【原文：Sweden’s Boliden AB is closing in on a deal to buy Lundin Mining Corp.’s two European mines, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 核心通胀放缓，墨西哥银行第三次降息
item.description: 墨西哥连续第三次降息，因为衡量基本通胀的一个关键指标出现回落，而且人们对拉美第二大经济体经济放缓的担忧加剧。【原文：Mexico delivered a third straight interest rate cut as a key measure of underlying inflation retreats and concerns mount over the slowdown in Latin America’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔警告量化宽松和前瞻性指引的弊端
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，在经济波动加剧时，应优先考虑利率和长期再融资操作，并警告大规模债券购买计划和前瞻性指导的危险性。【原文：Interest rates and longer-term refinancing operations should take priority in times of increased economic volatility, European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said, warning of the dangers of large scale bond-buying programs and forward guidance.】

item.title: 长滩港 10 月份吞吐量激增，刷新历史记录
item.description: 长滩港 10 月份运输了近 100 万个集装箱，打破了两个月前刚刚创下的纪录。【原文：The Port of Long Beach moved nearly 1 million containers in October, beating a record set just two months ago.】

item.title: 马来西亚贸易部长：美中裂痕带来长期痛苦
item.description: 马来西亚贸易与投资部负责人表示，尽管中美之间的贸易紧张局势为包括马来西亚在内的东南亚地区带来了更多投资，但对全球增长放缓和成本上升的担忧仍在隐隐作痛。【原文：While trade tensions between the US and China are bringing more investments to Southeast Asia, including Malaysia, worries over slower global growth and higher costs loom, according to Malaysia’s trade and investment chief.】
